org.sql: SELECT issue_relations.* FROM issue_relations WHERE issue_relations.issue_from_id = "$1" AND issue_relations.issue_to_id = "$2" AND issue_relations.relation_type IN ("$3", "$4")

rewrites.sql: SELECT issue_relations.* FROM issue_relations WHERE issue_relations.issue_from_id = "$1" AND issue_relations.issue_to_id = "$2" AND issue_relations.relation_type IN ("$3", "$4") LIMIT 1
